mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interaction i JOIN post p ON i.target_id = p.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND i.target_type = 1 -- 只统计帖子的互动
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interaction (user_id, target_type, target_id, type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{type})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} AND target_type = #{targetType}
